Funds are required for the following efforts:

Funds are available for transfer under section 9018 of the DoD Appropriations Act, 2019, which provided additional funds to improve the intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance capabilities of the DoD. This is Title IX OCO budget funding.
Funds will procure improvements in hardware and software for processing, exploitation. and dissemination capabilities ina COCOM. This is a MIP project. This is an OCO budget requirement.

Funds will be used to procure and install improved CCOP sensors aboard U.S. Navy ships to improve platform and theater force protection and indications and warning ina COCOM. This is a MIP project. This is an OCO budget requirement.

Funds are required for procurement, installation and establishment of a cloud-enabled | intelligence node to meet COCOM current intelligence product needs. This is a MIP project. This is | an OCO budget requirement.
